attributes.action: ensure the worst offending MPs are charged with fraud
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: MPs who have knowingly claimed expenses they know to be wrong have cheated the system and should be held accountable before the criminal courts just the same as anyone else eg benefit fraudsters

rejection.details: Government cannot charge or prosecute people. This is the role of police and the Crown Prosecution Service.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
